segments.text: Excuse me . I've been waiting here for 15 mins . Do you know how often does No . 3 run ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it runs every 20 mins . You must have missed it , when you came here . It should be here any minute now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that you have got here at a good time . Do you have a bus schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . You can go to the Transport Department to get yourself a bus schedule and a bus route map .
segments.speaker: S2
